alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:47AM PST until January 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches above 7,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph on exposed ridgetops and along the crest. * WHERE...The Southern Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Periods of snow may cause travel difficulties. Motorists should prepare to slick road conditions and potential travel delays. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra
